import os
from pathlib import Path
from collections import defaultdict

working_with = r"D:\\GIT\\PCGExtendedToolkitGitBook\\working-with-pcgex"

# Find all concept pages
concept_files = {}
for root, dirs, files in os.walk\(working_with\):
    for file in files:
        if file.endswith\('.md'\):
            full_path = os.path.join\(root, file\)
            relative = os.path.relpath\(full_path, working_with\)
            depth = relative.count\(os.sep\)
            concept_files[relative] = depth

# Sort by depth then path
sorted_concepts = sorted\(concept_files.items\(\), key=lambda x: \(x[1], x[0]\)\)

# Group by depth
by_depth = defaultdict\(list\)
for relative, depth in sorted_concepts:
    by_depth[depth].append\(relative\)

# Print
print\("=" * 80\)
print\("CONCEPT PAGES \(working-with-pcgex\) - HIERARCHY"\)
print\("=" * 80\)
print\(\)

for depth in sorted\(by_depth.keys\(\)\):
    pages = by_depth[depth]
    
    if depth == 0:
        print\(f"DEPTH 0 - ROOT:"\)
    else:
        print\(f"DEPTH {depth}:"\)
    
    for page in sorted\(pages\):
        indent = "  " * \(depth + 1\)
        # Highlight README files
        if page.endswith\('README.md'\):
            print\(f"{indent}ðŸ“˜ {page}"\)
        else:
            print\(f"{indent}â€¢ {page}"\)
    
    print\(\)

import os
from pathlib import Path
from collections import defaultdict

working_with = r"D:\\GIT\\PCGExtendedToolkitGitBook\\working-with-pcgex"

# Find all concept pages
concept_files = {}
for root, dirs, files in os.walk\(working_with\):
    for file in files:
        if file.endswith\('.md'\):
            full_path = os.path.join\(root, file\)
            relative = os.path.relpath\(full_path, working_with\)
            depth = relative.count\(os.sep\)
            concept_files[relative] = depth

# Sort by depth then path
sorted_concepts = sorted\(concept_files.items\(\), key=lambda x: \(x[1], x[0]\)\)

# Group by depth
by_depth = defaultdict\(list\)
for relative, depth in sorted_concepts:
    by_depth[depth].append\(relative\)

# Print
print\("=" * 80\)
print\("CONCEPT PAGES \(working-with-pcgex\) - HIERARCHY"\)
print\("=" * 80\)
print\(\)

for depth in sorted\(by_depth.keys\(\)\):
    pages = by_depth[depth]
    
    if depth == 0:
        print\("DEPTH 0 - ROOT:"\)
    else:
        print\("DEPTH {}:".format\(depth\)\)
    
    for page in sorted\(pages\):
        indent = "  " * \(depth + 1\)
        # Highlight README files
        if page.endswith\('README.md'\):
            print\("{} [INDEX] {}".format\(indent, page\)\)
        else:
            print\("{}â€¢ {}".format\(indent, page\)\)
    
    print\(\)
